title: BRAND detail page
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want each BRAND to have a dedicated page\
So I can find every piece of information about it in one place
description:
* Each BRAND has a detail page. → Status Code \`200\`
* The detail page contains a fact sheet with all properties that are specified for a BRAND node → see MCF-1.
* Each property in the fact sheet is displayed as a key-value pair (property and property value).
* When a property has no value it is still displayed in the fact sheet, but marked as empty.
* The name of the BRAND is reflected in the main headline and in the page title. The page title might contain additional text, like the suffix “ - More Cars“. The main headline might also contain additional information - for example to make generic nodes unique.
* A representative image of the BRAND is displayed at a prominent location on the page.
* An error message is shown when there exists no BRAND with the provided ID. → Status Code \`404\`
